com.compendium.core.db
Class DBCodeNode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBCodeNode

public class DBCodeNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBCodeNode class serves as the interface layer to the CodeNode table in the database for the relationship between Codes and Nodes in the datamodel.

i.e. What Codes have been assigned to what Nodes.

Author:
rema and sajid / Michelle Bachler

public static boolean insert(DBConnection dbcon,
                             java.lang.String sNodeID,
                             java.lang.String sCodeID)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new node - code relationship record in the database and returns true if successful.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID, - the id of the node being added.
sCodeID, - the id of the code assigned to the node.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
